# List of presidents of the Canadian National Railway Company

Presidents
List of presidents of the Canadian National Railway (CN) since 1919:
Presidents
{|class="wikitable"
|-
|Term(s)||Name||Country
|-
| 1919-1921 || David Blyth Hanna ||
|-
| 1922-1932 || Sir Henry W. Thornton ||
|-
| 1932-1941 || Samuel J. Hungerford ||
|-
| 1941-1949 || Robert Charles Vaughan||
|-
| 1950-1966 || Donald Gordon ||
|-
| 1967-1974 || Norman John MacMillan ||
|-
| 1974-1982 || Robert Angus Bandeen ||
|-
| 1982-1986 || J. Maurice LeClair ||
|-
| 1986-1992 || Ronald E. Lawless ||
|-
| 1992-2002 || Paul M. Tellier ||
|-
| 2002-2010 || E. Hunter Harrison||
|-
| 2010-2016|| Claude Mongeau ||
|-
|2016-2018|| Luc Jobin ||
|-
|2018-2022|| Jean-Jacques Ruest ||
|-
|2022-|| Tracy A. Robinson ||
|}
